endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: split_at

param_schema.description: When using mode 'edit', split transcription at the word level or character level. Default: word level. Character level is more precise but can lead to matching errors.

parameters.description: When using mode 'edit', split transcription at the word level or character level. Default: word level. Character level is more precise but can lead to matching errors.

parameters.name: video_in

param_schema.title: Video In
param_schema.description: Video file to transcribe or edit

parameters.description: Video file to transcribe or edit

parameters.name: transcription

param_schema.title: Transcription
param_schema.description: When using mode 'edit', this should be the transcription of the desired output video. Use mode 'transcribe' to create a starting point.

parameters.description: When using mode 'edit', this should be the transcription of the desired output video. Use mode 'transcribe' to create a starting point.
